original_text: One evening, David got up from his bed. He walked around on the roof of his palace. From the roof he saw a woman who was washing herself. She was very beautiful. Samuel 10 Samuel 12
korean_text: 저녁 때에 다윗이 그의 침상에서 일어나 왕궁 옥상에서 거닐다가 그 곳에서 보니 한 여인이 목욕을 하는데 심히 아름다워 보이는지라

sentences.original_text: One evening, David got up from his bed.
He walked around on the roof of his palace.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 궁전 지붕 위를 걸어 다녔습니다.

sentences.original_text: From the roof he saw a woman
